#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
 
bool ispalindrome(int n){
	int result = 0,a;
	a = n;
	while(n>0){
		result = result*10+n%10;
		n = n/10;
	}
	if((a-result)==0){
	 //cout<<result<<" is a palindrome"<<endl;	
	 return true;	
	}
	 
	else{
	//	cout<<result<<" isnot a palindrome"<<endl;
	   return false;
	}
	  
}
 
bool isprime(int n){
	int result=sqrt(n);
	for(int i=2;i<result;i++){
		if(n%i==0)
			return false;
		 
	}
	return true;
}
int main()
{
	int n;
	cin>>n;
	while(n<=100000000){
		if(ispalindrome(n)&&isprime(n)){
			cout<<n<<endl;
			break;
		}else{
	//		cout<<"increased";
			n++;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
